name: Gas Chromatograph Bk-GC7820
description: Appliance: The Analysis of Environmental Samples; Ray Type: Gamma Ray Spectrometer; Gaspath System: Double; Detector: FID; Energy Resolution: ≤7.5%; Certification: CE, ISO

name: Spectrophotometer 6320
description: Spectrometer ( Molec. ): UV/VIS; Easy to use; Versatile sampling system; Full interfacing capability; G.L.P. compliant; 320-1000nm/8nm SBW; Domed lid enables use with tall sample tubes

name: Centrifuge 5702
description: Max. speed: 3,000 x g (4,400 rpm); Optimizes air flow minimizes sample warming during run; SOFT brake function for slow acceleration and braking. Optimized for cell separation by gradient centrifugation; Low access height for simple loading and unloading of samples

name: Digital Refractometer
description: Model DR301-95 digital hand-held refractometer. Includes refractive index, sugar and salt scales. Unit is capable of being programmed for two user-defined scales via PC serial interface. Measurement range: 1.3330 - 1.5318 nD, 0 - 95 %Brix; Accuracy: +/- 0.00015 nD, +/- 0.1 %Brix; Temperature measurement: 5 to 40°C or 41 to 104°F; Temperature compensation: 5 to 40°C

name: Rheometer
description: Patented Ultra-low Inertia Drag Cup Motor; Patented Second Generation Magnetic Bearing; High-Resolution Optical Encoder; Nano-Torque Motor Control; Direct Strain Oscillation

name: Digital Lux Meter
description: Spectral response in line with international standards CIE Lighting Association; Measure range: 0.1Lux~100x500Lux; Resolution up to 0.1Lux; High accuracy, fast response
